column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Chris D. - Thanks for your review. I'm sorry to hear you were displeased with the ramen bowls you ordered. For future reference
column2: please know that if you have any issue whatsoever with our food
column3: just tell your server and they will be happy to send it back to the chefs to remake so it meets your satisfaction. Furthermore
column4: we do not add MSG to our ramen; however
column5: some of the ingredients that are used to prepare our broth
